entry.title: Changes to BIP-360 - Pay to Quantum Resistant Hash (P2QRH)
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the advantages of dynamic script endorsement and its potential benefits that still hold value despite an earlier oversight. The conversation points towards a proactive approach to formalize these ideas, with plans to draft a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) during available free time. This initiative indicates a significant step towards enhancing Bitcoin's scripting capabilities, demonstrating a commitment to improving the cryptocurrency's infrastructure and securing its future development.
